actions.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Miller, Gary.
On agreeing to the Miller, Gary amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment adds brownfield redevelopment, as specifically defined in the Small Business Liability Relief and Brownfield Revitalization Act of 2001, to the list of exemptions contained in the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-266 to specify that the term economic development in the bill does not include the redevelopment of brownfield sites.
